meta.title: Muhammad Talha Zaheer | Full Stack Developer & Cybersecurity Professional
meta.description: Short summary of your skills and experience.

personal.name: Muhammad Talha Zaheer
personal.title: Full Stack Developer & Cyber Security Professional
personal.about: Future-Focused Computer Scientist | Aspiring Cybersecurity Expert | Innovator in Technology and Digital Defense
personal.workingHours: Asynchronous-first, with dedicated availability for team sync-ups in any time zone.

experience.title: Node JS Developer
experience.description: Implemented web applications with integrated AI agents using Python and Node.js.
achievements: Developed and deployed web applications with seamless AI agent integration in both Python and Node.js environments.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and real-time communication between web frontends and AI backends.
Integrated third-party AI services and custom machine learning models to enhance application intelligence.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver robust, scalable, and maintainable solutions.
Optimized application performance and reliability through testing, monitoring, and CI/CD pipelines.
Documented technical patterns and mentored team members on AI integration best practices.

experience.title: HTB Meetup Host
experience.description: Host online and on-campus cyber security events at various universities, teaching students about cyber security concepts and practices, and providing resources and opportunities to enhance their skills.
achievements: Organized and hosted cyber security workshops and events for university students across multiple institutions.
Delivered engaging sessions on cyber security fundamentals, hands-on labs, and real-world scenarios.
Provided students with Hack The Box vouchers and curated resources to practice and improve their cyber security skills.
Mentored and guided students in navigating cyber security career paths and certifications.
Built a collaborative learning environment, fostering interest and participation in cyber security communities.
Coordinated with university faculty and Hack The Box to expand event reach and impact.

projects.title: CTF Platform
projects.shortDescription: Manage tasks, participants, and scores for competitions.
description: A CTF platform for conducting Capture The Flag competitions. Manage tasks (Docker, static files, etc.), participants, and scores (team based scoring, task based scoring) for competitions.
features: Add static files, Docker tasks, etc.
Team based scoring, task based scoring
Track the progress of the competition

projects.title: Darzee Mobile App
projects.shortDescription: Platform for connecting tailors and customers.
description: A mobile app for connecting tailors and customers. Users can order custom clothes and track the progress of their orders. find nearest tailors and get quotes for their services.
features: Track the progress of the orders
Find nearest tailors and get quotes for their services

projects.title: POS System
description: A POS System for a Restaurant. It allows the restaurant to manage their menu items, deals, and orders with printing receipts and storing data on a server.
